name: Out of the Frying Pan
description:
Mission Level: Out of the Frying Pan

Standard FPS Controls
E to interact

Uncommon bright lights

To launch game;

-Download OutOfTheFryingPan.zip
-Extract items all to a location of your choice
-Open folder titled "WindowsNoEditor"
-Launch .exe title "MyProject7"
